name: Mahfuzur Rahman
description: Very good quality chair üòçüòç. The seller is also very good & helpful. They sent me a quality-full chair. I received the delivery within three days. I'm satisfied üòä

name: Rokon Ahmed
description: The chair is very good...Worth of service and quality...Excellent purchase within the price....

name: Nishad Rahman
description: First Buying Chair from daraz.. chair ta onk valo legeche.. Tobe chair choose korar jnno color combination thaka dorkar.. others color er gulou valo.. Chair ti onk comfortable.  Asha kori sobai nite paren.. review ta 5 days por dilam.. use korar por. üòäThanks sellar

name: Showkat Ahmed
description: The chair is nice and comfortable. I am very much satisfied with the PRICE and product. One thing though, the hand rests are slightly down then usual and the back rest middle plastic frame firstly felt a little uncomfortable. But now after a week use I am very much satisfied. Well packed and well Received. This is my first purchase from the shop.

name: Shariar
description: Products is good enough. Nothing fault found.Delivery is  fast enough. I ordered the chair 21 February and i get it 24 February. Chair quality is good but the back support Disappointed me. Back support is not good, it's soft.Overall this chair is great.

name: Ibrahim
description: compair to the price the product is good. the chair back is really comfortable. I would have given it 5 star but I'm not going it. the main reason is, the handles are too low for anyone to keep your hand on it. other than that everything looks good

name: Md. Rabbi
description: I have received the product on time but after opening the package I have noticed that the back net of the chair is broken. Please let me know if I can replace it. Thanks
